DOC.brief_summary: The current study is designed to estimate the effect of rifampin (600 mg orally every 24 hours for 7 days) on pharmacokinetics of single 30 mg dose (CP-690,550) in normal healthy volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Estimate The Effect Of Repeat-Dose Rifampin On The Pharmacokinetics Of CP-690,550 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects (of nonchildbearing potential) Clinically significant disease or condition Recent serious infection
